presentationColumns.name: Avg Invoice Unit Price (Primary UOM)
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as Sum of Invoice Amounts divided by Sum of Invoiced Quantity where Quantity Invoiced is not zero. This metric is calculated for Invoice distributions conforming as Addressable Spend in primary UOM.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Spend.Avg Invoice Unit Price in Analytics Currency (Primary UOM)

presentationColumns.name: Max Invoice Unit Price (Primary UOM)
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as Maximum of Invoice Amounts divided by Invoiced Quantity where Quantity Invoiced is not zero. This metric is calculated for Invoice distributions conforming as Addressable Spend in primary UOM.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Spend.Max Invoice Unit Price in Analytics Currency (Primary UOM)

presentationColumns.name: Min Invoice Unit Price (Primary UOM)
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as Minimum of Invoice Amounts divided by Invoiced Quantity where Quantity Invoiced is not zero. This metric is calculated for Invoice distributions conforming as Addressable Spend in primary UOM.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - PRC - Spend.Min Invoice Unit Price in Analytics Currency (Primary UOM)
